name: Sunset Gunners
description:
Hey, Gamers!

Welcome to "Sunset Gamers". We bring you the most exciting multiplayer game in the market so you can enjoy playing it with your friends. Install now and start playing with your favorite green soldier character and start challenging your friends in the biggest deathmatch ever.

The one with most kills will win the game, so let's go! what are you waiting for?

Download today and make sure to write a review to us and rate us. So we can improve the game as per your demands.
